author: senh
title: In Transit: On a New York Tour Bus, a New View of History
text: BING NEWS: City, Transit Union Settle Lawsuit Over Bus Driver Arrests It signaled a de-escalation of tension over what is known as the city’s “failure to yield” law, which a union official said has resulted in the arrests of at least seven New York City Transit bus drivers since the measure was enacted in June 2014. 09/1/2015 - 2:51 am | View Link Tour of Transit Road through rearview mirror This is a tour of Transit Road. Not the Transit you see during your frustrating rush-hour commute. Or the Transit that lures you to the big-box retailers and restaurants on the weekends. This is a view of Transit ... Western New York, a volunteer ... 08/15/2015 - 2:53 pm | View Link Crash between York Region Transit bus, tanker truck closes stretch of Green Lane west of Yonge Street A York Region Transit bus operator and a tanker transport truck driver have been hospitalized after their vehicles collided this morning just west of the intersection of Yonge Street and Green Lane In East Gwillimbury. 06/25/2015 - 7:55 am | View Link Use of NJ Transit stops proposed for tour buses into Princeton PRINCETON — Princeton may have found a solution to tour bus traffic downtown: NJ Transit stops.
